pkgmetadata.longdescription: django-oauth2-provider======================.. image:: https://travis-ci.org/caffeinehit/django-oauth2-provider.png?branch=master*django-oauth2-provider* is a Django application that providescustomizable OAuth2\-authentication for your Django projects.`Documentation <http://readthedocs.org/docs/django-oauth2-provider/en/latest/>`_`Help <https://groups.google.com/d/forum/django-oauth2-provider>`_License=======*django-oauth2-provider* is released under the MIT License. Please see the LICENSE file for details.
